HomePage.heading_features: Custom-Made for You with a Variety of Features
HomePage.desc_features: You can try making digital wedding invitations for free by clicking the button below
HomePage.variety_of_themes_desc: We provide a variety of themes to choose from.
HomePage.monetary_gifts_desc: There is a feature to send wedding monetary gifts
HomePage.custom_domain_desc: Customize your invite URL with a unique domain.
HomePage.step_1_desc: First, fill in the bride and groom's information, quotes, and the bride's photo.
HomePage.step_2_desc: Next, please upload the photos you'd like to display on your invitation.
HomePage.step_3_desc: Finally, fill in information related to your event.
HomePage.step_4_desc: Lastly, choose the theme and music you'd like to use for your invitation.
HomePage.testimony_desc: Come and listen to stories from our friends who have tried our products and services. These testimonials are real proof that we don’t just make promises, but truly deliver the best!
HomePage.testimony_1: Finally, alhamdulillah, honestly, I’m super satisfied with Dinanti.id's digital invitations because you can request exactly what you want, and it’s not just some basic template. So, no one else will have the same invite as you, you know? It feels super unique and totally matches your dream wedding invitation vibe. Later, if I’ve already uploaded my vendors and stuff, I’ll share it on social media and also promo it to my friends who are getting married.
